meanings.definition: The district under the jurisdiction of an archbishop.
meanings.sent1: In some countries, multiple archdioceses are overseen by different archbishops.
meanings.sent2: The archdioceses in this region are known for their beautiful cathedrals.
meanings.sent3: The archdioceses decided to have a friendly competition to see who could raise the most funds for charity.
meanings.sent4: The archdioceses stood tall like guardians, protecting the spiritual well-being of the people.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the archdioceses felt like stepping into a sacred realm filled with history and faith.

meanings.definition: The office or rank of an archbishop.
meanings.sent1: He aspired to reach the highest level in the church hierarchy and attain the archdioceses.
meanings.sent2: The archdioceses is a position of great responsibility and honor.
meanings.sent3: Becoming the archdioceses meant he had to wear the ceremonial robes every day.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chess, the queen piece could be compared to the archdioceses, holding significant power.
meanings.sent5: The archdioceses carried themselves with grace and dignity, symbolizing their elevated status.

meanings.sent1: The archdioceses oversaw the spiritual needs of a large community.
meanings.sent2: People from all walks of life gathered in the archdioceses to seek guidance.
meanings.sent3: The archdioceses hosted a special event to celebrate unity among different parishes.
meanings.sent4: The archdioceses was like a beacon of light, guiding believers through their spiritual journey.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the archdioceses felt like being embraced by a warm, welcoming community.
